tika-s0402t6:1: 65. Dutiyassa paṭhame sabbakāmanipphattimūlakaṁ sukhanti anavasesaupabhogaparibhogavatthunipphattihetukaṁ kāmasukhaṁ. Pabbajjāmūlakaṁ sukhanti pabbajjāhetukaṁ pavivekasukhaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:2_0: 66. Dutiye kāmeti pañca kāmaguṇe, sabbepi vā tebhūmake dhamme. Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘sabbepi
tika-s0402t6:2_1: tebhūmakā dhammā kamanīyaṭṭhena kāmā’’ti (mahāni. 1). Nekkhammaṁ vuccati pabbajjā
tika-s0402t6:4: Sabbepi kusalā dhammā, nekkhammanti pavuccare’’ti. (itivu. aṭṭha. 109) –
tika-s0402t6:6: 67. Tatiye upadhī vuccanti pañcupādānakkhandhā, tannissitaṁ sukhaṁ upadhisukhaṁ. Tappaṭipakkhato nirupadhisukhaṁ lokuttarasukhaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:7: 68. Catutthe vaṭṭapariyāpannaṁ sukhaṁ vaṭṭasukhaṁ. Nibbānārammaṇaṁ sukhaṁ vivaṭṭasukhaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:8: 69. Pañcame saṁkilesanti saṁkiliṭṭhaṁ. Tenāha ‘‘vaṭṭagāmisukha’’nti. Vivaṭṭasukhanti maggaphalasahagataṁ sukhaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:9: 70. Chaṭṭhe ariyānameva sukhaṁ ariyasukhaṁ, ariyañca taṁ sukhañcātipi ariyasukhaṁ. Anariyānameva sukhaṁ anariyasukhaṁ. Anariyañca taṁ sukhañcātipi anariyasukhaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:11_0: 72. Aṭṭhame saha pītiyā vattatīti sappītikaṁ, pītisahagataṁ sukhaṁ. Sabhāvato virāgato
tika-s0402t6:11_1: ca natthi etassa pītīti nippītikaṁ sukhaṁ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ panettha jhānasukhameva
tika-s0402t6:11_2: uddhaṭaṁ, tathā ca ‘‘lokiyasappītikasukhato lokiyanippītikasukhaṁ agga’’nti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:11_3: Lokiyanippītikampi hi aggaṁ labbhatevāti bhūmantaraṁ bhinditvā aggabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t6:12_0: 73. Navame sātasabhāvameva sukhaṁ sātasukhaṁ, na upekkhāsukhaṁ viya asātasabhāvaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:12_1: Kāmañcettha kāyaviññāṇasahagatampi sātasukhameva, aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘tīsu jhānesu
tika-s0402t6:13: 74. Dasame samādhisampayuttaṁ sukhaṁ samādhisukhaṁ. Na samādhisampayuttaṁ sukhaṁ asamādhisukhaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:15_0: 77. Terasame rūpajjhānaṁ rūpaṁ uttarapadalopena, taṁ ārammaṇaṁ etassāti rūpārammaṇaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:15_1: Catutthajjhānaggahaṇaṁ pana yadassa paṭiyogī, tena samānayogakkhamadassanaparaṁ.
tika-s0402t6:15_2: Yaṁ kiñci rūpanti yaṁ kiñci ruppanalakkhaṇaṁ rūpaṁ. Tappaṭikkhepena arūpaṁ veditabbaṁ.
